analysis.description:
RubleCoinCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x290c6ec7f2d61bae27d91a5383bb979911a12f70.sol#383-414) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x290c6ec7f2d61bae27d91a5383bb979911a12f70.sol#401-403)
	-token.mint(owner,tokensToOwner) (/unique_chucks/19/0x290c6ec7f2d61bae27d91a5383bb979911a12f70.sol#403-404)

Reentrancy in RubleCoinCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x290c6ec7f2d61bae27d91a5383bb979911a12f70.sol#383-414):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x290c6ec7f2d61bae27d91a5383bb979911a12f70.sol#401-403)
	- token.mint(owner,tokensToOwner) (/unique_chucks/19/0x290c6ec7f2d61bae27d91a5383bb979911a12f70.sol#403-404)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensMinted (/unique_chucks/19/0x290c6ec7f2d61bae27d91a5383bb979911a12f70.sol#404-405)
	- tokensMinted (/unique_chucks/19/0x290c6ec7f2d61bae27d91a5383bb979911a12f70.sol#405-410)
